archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.1.10f: f) recording patches that have been applied (e.g. in a specialised patch management tool, a Configuration Management Database (CMDB) or Configuration Management System (CMS)).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
